input.sentences: i awoke | poured a cup of coffee and headed toward my computer .
i set down and immediately checked my email .
i could n't believe what i saw | [male] was in danger . i immediately jumped in the car and rushed to his house and the medics were on the scene .
he was terribly ill | and i watched as they placed him in the med-flight helicopter .
it was a sad sight watching the helicopter take off and i sped to meet them at the hospital .
